Welcome to iCOS LIVE!
iCOS LIVE is a cloud based transport management system that can track your freight from anywhere at anytime. iCOS LIVE will help your business drive efficiency and stop revenue leakage , giving you back time to work on the business, not in it - it's online transport management made easy.
You can record your general freight, container or bulk bookings, manage dispatching them to your fleet, see real-time status updates from your drivers, and manage checking and invoicing completed work - all with the latest in leading edge web based tools and technologies.
Unlike other solutions, iCOS LIVE puts all these tools in the hands of small and large companies alike.
Benefits of using iCOS LIVE
Increase Productivity
iCOS LIVE's industry specific, streamlined tools allow transport opreators to cut out the day-to-day grind and get on with working on the business rather than in it.
Empower your customers
With iCOS LIVE, transport customers can self-serve to manage their own accounts; saving valuable customer service time whilst increasing accuracy. Customers love iCOS LIVE.
Save money
iCOS LIVE helps save you money by identifying areas where you are leaking revenue and helping you to plug them, and helping you save on resources by working smarter.
